Introduction

Template for Mikrotik CCR1009

Should work on any Mikrotik device on which the output of "system health print oid" includes:

  • active-fan: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.9.0
  • voltage: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.8.0
  • temperature: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.10.0
  • cpu-temperature: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.11.0
  • power-consumption: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.12.0
  • psu1-state: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.15.0
  • psu2-state: .1.3.6.1.4.1.14988.1.1.3.16.0

Tested on CCR1009-7G-1C-1S+ running RouterOS 6.44.5

Does not work on hAP lite routers.

Created by full clone of Zabbix's Template Net Mikrotik SNMPv2 then:

  • Added application Health
  • Added items:
    • Active fan
    • CPU temperature
    • PSU 1 state
    • PSU 2 state
    • Power consumption
    • Temperature
    • Voltage
  • Added triggers:
    • Active fan change
    • PSU 1 fail
    • PSU 2 fail
    • CPU temperature high

Installation

Administration > General > Macros: SNMP_COMMUNITY

Administration > General > Value mapping

  • Name: Mikrotik PSU state
  • Mappings
    • Value: 0 > Not OK
    • Value: 2 > OK
    • Value: 3 > Not OK
    • Value: 4 > Not OK
    • Value: 5 > Not OK
    • Value: 6 > Not OK
  • Add

Download the file (link below).

Configuration > Templates > Import > browse to the downloaded file > Import

Configure a host > Templates > Link new templates > search for Template Net Mikrotik CCR1009 SNMPv2 > Add

Bugs

  • Voltage is shown in deci-Volts because converting to Volts removes the fractional part ref https://support.zabbix.com/browse/ZBX-15848.
  • Mapping "Mikrotik PSU state" has probably unused values because the possible values were not known. Please comment or mail the author if you have further information.
